author: cnbc.com
title: Carriage Services Announces 2017 Annual Results Earnings Release and Conference Call Schedule
text:
HOUSTON, Feb. 7, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Carriage Services, Inc. (NYSE: CSV) today announced plans to release 2017 annual results on Wednesday, February 14, 2018 after the market closes. In conjunction with the release, Carriage Services has scheduled a conference call, which will be broadcast live over the Internet on Thursday, February 15, 2018 at 9:30 a.m. central time.
What:
Carriage Services 2017 Annual Earnings Conference Call
When:
Thursday, February 15, 2018 – 9:30 a.m. central time
How:
Live via phone – By dialing 866-516-3867 (conference ID 3978299) or live over the Internet by logging on to the Company's website at www.carriageservices.com .
An audio archive of the call will be available either by phone until February 19, 2018 by dialing toll-free 855-859-2056 (conference ID 3978299) or on the Company's website at www.carriageservices.com . For more information, please contact Viki Blinderman at 713-332-8568 or Ben Brink at 713-332-8441 or email InvestorRelations@carriageservices.com .
View original content: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/carriage-services-announces-2017-annual-results-earnings-release-and-conference-call-schedule-300595354.html
SOURCE Carriage Services, Inc.
